name: places/ChIJWSWYBgBZwokRk2X37k0Ja_0
adrFormatAddress: 1114 6th Ave, New York, NY 10110, USA

originalText.text:
I have been a keen customer at this place since last year. However, what happened to me yesterday makes me never come back again.
I placed an online order and arrived there on time. I directly walked to the pickup corner as usual. There was one staff standing in front of the shelves talking to another lady. I waited there for a few second and nobody attended me. I decided to get my order myself. FYI in my previous experience, I always pick up my order myself and they don't always have a staff helping with the pick-up.
The instant I reached out to the order, the staff suddenly ended his conversation, PUSHED AWAY MY ARM and asked me to show a confirmation email. I totally understand that the restaurant need to confirm that we are getting the right thing, but they can do this in a more respectful way.  I don't know what makes him feel that to prevent a customer from getting her order with physical intervention is somehow acceptable.

originalText.text: YUMMY! So worth the hype! We got the spicy tuna it was so good, it exceeded my expectations! We also got the Avocado it was okay compared to the Spicy Tuna tbh. And for drinks we wanted to try the best sellers so we got the pick me up, go away doc, and stress down. My favorite was the pick me up; it was refreshing and filling!!

originalText.text: Their smoothies do bop. And their staffs are nice and professional. But they are “severely” understaffed for the amount of inflow. I feel for them because I’ve been in their shoe before. But facts are facts. They need an extra staff or two. If you walk into Juice Generation anywhere in Manhattan you will see the double the amount of staff in shifts. This will definitely improve the overall customer experience

originalText.text: I came in this morning for a coffee but accidentally ordered a hot latte instead of iced. When I politely asked the barista if I could change it to iced since it hadn't been made yet, I was met with yelling instead. This is unacceptable. Please ensure better training for your employees. I came for a coffee, not to be yelled at.

originalText.text: We came here 7:30 PM, we were about to put our order for 2 sandwiches And 2 lattes but suddenly an employee came to the cashier being impolite and said there was no more hot drinks, so we have to cancel our entire order and leave. What a disappointment, there was an hour and a half left to the closing. Still nobody explained us why we couldn’t be served. Horrible behavior, never coming back
